entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When a custom NavigationDelegate is set in iOS, Navigated is not called #11074
  • UI controls not working very well on ios - NET7.0 #11072
  • SkiaSharp (or LiveCharts) causes crash in release mode #11069
  • MSAL auth - Android - Release - crash after splashscreen #11067
  • Changes not re-rendering in Hot Reload #11066
  • [android] warnings from Glide for image URLs #11065
    Backlog
  • Issue 7015 has not been fixed, please reopen this issue #11063
    Backlog
  • Importing a JS module into a .NET MAUI Blazor app fails #11062
  • VS will no longer create a useable Maui project #11061
  • svg icons with light and dark theme styles #11060
    Backlog
  • Add interface for Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.MainThread #11054
    Backlog
  • List view items source replaced with selected item when binding selected item #11052
    Backlog

Closed

  • Shell Flyout Occasionally Missing Items #9396
  • MAUI fails to hide keyboard in android when text view control closes the input #11047
  • CollectionView not sized correctly on iOS #11070
    Backlog
  • Blazor HTML Code Event not working on .Net Maui Blazor App #9987
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Desktop tenets: DPI awareness #2549
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • WPF & Winforms with Blazor app leak 2 file system handles every time app.css is saved #11064
  • Can't dynamically set HasShadow on Frame #11025
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • fix issue 9255 (Wrong Date format DatePicker Windows) #11073
    community ✨
  • Continue if provisionator fails #11068
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cherry pick net7 #11056
  • [Android] Fix Stepper IsEnabled property changes #11053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22524.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22551.1 #11058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.2.1 to 4.3.0 #11059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping] Add more Frame Device tests #11057
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [iOS/macOS] Fix issue updating the Frame HasShadow property #11055
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1370.28 to 1.0.1418.22 #11035
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Invoke provisionator with AUTH_TOKEN_GITHUB_COM set #11041
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove unused reference #11048
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Enable Codeql #10889
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [foldable] XML doc additions #10972
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11027
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
